questions.question: What is the purpose of React's useState hook?

options.a: To fetch data from an API

questions.question: Which lifecycle method is invoked immediately after updating occurs in a class component?

options.d: A library for creating UI components

questions.question: In Redux, what is the purpose of a reducer?

options.b: To reduce the amount of code needed
options.c: To describe how the application's state changes in response to actions
options.d: To handle side effects like API calls

questions.question: What is the primary role of an action in Redux?
Which method is used to send an action to the Redux store?
What is the role of the event loop in Node.js?

options.c: To block the execution of code

questions.question: Which module is used to work with file systems in Node.js?
What does the 'npm start' command do?

options.a: Starts the Node.js application using the default script
